properties.name: Duna Pb-Ba-(Ag) deposit, Karaj County, Alborz Province, Iran
properties.description:
Duna Pb-Ba-(Ag) deposit, Karaj County, Alborz Province, Iran

Type: 60

Location: Iran

Mineralization at the Duna Pb-Ba-(Ag) mine has been structurally controlled by the Duna anticline and faults and has chemically been affected by bituminous layers, dolomitic horizons, and impermeable volcanic rocks of Permian age. The structure of the ...

properties.name: Likak deposit, Bahmai County, Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province, Iran
properties.description:
Likak deposit, Bahmai County, Kohgiluyeh and Boyer-Ahmad Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Celestite mineralization occurs as two northwest-southeast trending beds in the Gachsaran Formation, showing an average dip of 60 toward northeast. The lower celestite bed has a length of 1.5 km, and its thickness decreases from southeast to northwest....
